review_text: We use to go there after work. Plenty of choices. Good tastes although oily (but everything in China is oily). Service super fast. Good fish. Good soups. Good noodles. Price average. I recommend.

One of the best meals we have had! Do not miss the roast lamb ribs and beef ribs. The roast...

A colleague who is from Shanxi province took me here for dinner during a recent trip to Beijing. We ate A LOT of food, and I think we probably about cleared the table. Hua sheng (peanuts with vinegar, garlic, green onions...???) were fantastic, soft hand-made tofu with a similar spicy vinegar/soy sauce, flat noodle with fresh cucumber and peppers, bbq...
